kv15.11:7.3: Kusalena kammena sahajāto kammūpacayo kusaloti, na hevaṃ vattabbe … pe ….
kv15.11:8.3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena kammena sahajāto kammūpacayo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttoti?
kv15.11:8.8: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena kammena sahajāto kammūpacayo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttoti?
kv15.11:10.3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena kammena sahajāto kammūpacayo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttoti?
kv15.11:10.8: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena kammena sahajāto kammūpacayo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttoti?
kv15.11:12.1: Kammaṃ cittena sahajātaṃ, cittaṃ bhijjamānaṃ kammaṃ bhijjatīti?
kv15.11:12.3: Kammūpacayo cittena sahajāto, cittaṃ bhijjamānaṃ kammūpacayo bhijjatīti?
kv15.11:13.1: Kammūpacayo cittena sahajāto, cittaṃ bhijjamānaṃ kammūpacayo na bhijjatīti?
kv15.11:13.3: Kammaṃ cittena sahajātaṃ, cittaṃ bhijjamānaṃ kammaṃ na bhijjatīti?
kv15.11:15.3: Taññeva kammaṃ, so kammūpacayo, so kammavipākoti?
kv15.11:16.1: Kammamhi kammūpacayo, kammūpacayato vipāko nibbattati, vipāko sārammaṇoti?
kv15.11:17.4: “idha, puṇṇa, ekacco sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi vacīsaṅkhāraṃ … pe …
kv15.11:17.6: manosaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, so sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi kāyasaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā, sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi vacīsaṅkhāraṃ … pe …
kv15.11:17.8: manosaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi lokaṃ upapajjati.
kv15.11:17.9: Tamenaṃ sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi lokaṃ upapannaṃ samānaṃ sabyābajjhāpi abyābajjhāpi phassā phusanti.
kv15.11:17.10: So sabyābajjhehipi abyābajjhehipi phassehi phuṭṭho samāno sabyābajjhampi abyābajjhampi vedanaṃ vedeti vokiṇṇasukhadukkhaṃ, seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā.
kv15.11:17.11: Iti kho, puṇṇa, bhūtā bhūtassa upapatti hoti, yaṃ karoti tena upapajjati, upapannametaṃ phassā phusanti.
kv15.11:20.1: Paccayatā vavatthitā, paṭiccasamuppādo, addhā, khaṇo layo muhuttaṃ, cattāro āsavā anāsavā, lokuttarānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ lokuttarā, saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti lokuttarā, saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti lokiyā, saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpanno kālaṃ kareyya, sveva maggo asaññasattupapattiyā, aññaṃ kammaṃ añño kammūpacayoti.
